about-pndek-in: pndek.in is a free link shortening service that allows you to create shorter and easier-to-remember links. This service was created by Jalu Wibowo Aji as a personal project to learn the JavaScript framework, Remix. In addition to Remix as the main framework, this service also uses several other technologies such as Redis, Telegram Bot, and others.
